1: <pb/>Lix Nohemí wank re jun xkomon, xkomoneb' laj Elimelek li xb'eelom. Li winq a'an b'ihom, aj Bohos xk'ab'a'.
2: <pb/>Sa' jun kutan lix Rut aj Mohab kixye re lix Nohemí: <pb/>—Kanab'in chi xik sa' k'aleb'aal chi xxokb'al kach'inaq linseeb'aad. Twaj tinxik b'arwi' k'ulb'ilaqin sa' xyaalal.<f>[3]</f> <pb/>Ut a'an kixsume: <pb/>—Ayu, at inko', chan.
3: <pb/>Koho lix Rut ut ki'ok chi xxokb'al ru li seb'aad chirixeb' laj k'anjel, ab'anan kox'okaq sa' jun xch'och' laj Bohos, a' li xkomon laj Elimelek.
4: Sa' li honal a'an, laj Bohos yo chaq chi chalk Belén chi rilb'aleb' laj k'anjel. Kixk'e xsahilaleb' xch'ool laj sik'ol seb'aad ut kixye reheb': <pb/>—Eerik'inaq taxaq li Qaawa'. <pb/>—Li Qaawa' chi'osob'tesinq aawe, chankeb' a'an.
5: <pb/>Toja' naq laj Bohos kixpatz' re laj ilol reheb' laj k'anjel: <pb/>—Ani li saaj ixq a'an? chan.
6: <pb/>Ut laj ilol reheb' laj k'anjel kixye: <pb/>—A'an li saaj ixq aj Mohab li xchalk chirix lix Nohemí sa' li na'ajej Mohab.
7: Xtz'aama usilal chiwu re naq truuq tixxok ru li seb'aad li neke'xkanab' laj k'anjel, ut chalen naq xk'ulunk eq'la yo chi k'anjelak toj anaqwan.
8: <pb/>Toja' naq laj Bohos kixye re lix Rut: <pb/>—Ab'i, at ch'ina ixq. Matxik chi xokok ru li seb'aad sa' jalan na'ajej chi moko tatnajto'q arin. Kanaaqat sa' li na'ajej a'in rik'ineb' linmoos.
9: K'e reetal li ch'och' b'arwi' neke'xik ut ayu chirixeb'. Laa'in xeb'inchaq'rab'i naq ink'a' tate'xch'i'ch'i'i, ut wi taachaqiq aawe, ayu wan wi' xna'aj li ha' ut uk' li ha' ak xe'risi chaq linmoos.
10: <pb/>Naq xrab'i a'in, lix Rut kixk'utzub' rib' sa' ch'och' ut kixye re: <pb/>—K'a'ut naq xintaw usilal chawu? Yal aj ab'l tenamitin laa'in, ut laa'at sa nikinaawil.
11: <pb/>Kichaq'ok laj Bohos: <pb/>—Ninnaw chi us chixjunil li xab'aanu rik'in laj alib'ahom aawe chirix xkamik laab'eelom, ut ninnaw ajwi' naq xakanab' laana' laayuwa' ut li na'ajej xatyo'laak wi', ut xatchalk sa' jun tenamit ink'a' nawb'il aab'aan.
12: Li Qaawa' chik'ehoq aawe reeqaj li chaab'il k'anjel xab'aanu! A' taxaq li Qaawa', xYos laj Israel, li rub'el li xwankil xulaak'e aawib' chi xmuheela, chiq'ajkamunq aawe jo' aak'ulub', chan.
13: <pb/>Toja' naq lix Rut kixye: <pb/>—Usilal xintaw chawu: k'ajo' naq xak'ojob' linch'ool. Us ta laa'in maawa'in xkomoneb' laamoos ixq, ab'anan laa'at xawaj xk'eeb'al xsahil li waanm.
14: <pb/>Naq xtaw xhonalil li wa'ak, laj Bohos kixye re: <pb/>—Jilon chaq arin ut wa'in. Tzeka jun ch'uyulaq li wa tz'ab'il sa' vinaagr. <pb/>Kik'ojlaak lix Rut sa' xyanqeb' laj sik'ol seb'aad, ut laj Bohos kixk'e jun mooch' xjoranb'il k'ux. Kiwa'ak li ixq toj reetal kik'ojlaak xch'ool, ut toj wank ki'ela'ank chiru.
15: Chirix chik a'an, naq kixaqliik re ok wi' chik chi k'anjelak, laj Bohos kixye reheb' laj k'anjel: <pb/>—Kanab'omaq li ixq chi xxokb'al kach'inaq re sa' xyanq li seb'aad ak b'ak'b'o chi joob', ut meeq'us chi xb'aanunkil.
16: Naru ajwi' teekanab' chi t'ane'k junqaq ru li seb'aad re naq a'an taaxokoq re, ut meech'iila.
17: <pb/>Ak x'ewuuk chik naq lix Rut kixkanab' xxokb'al ru li seb'aad sa' xch'och' laj Bohos. Tojo' naq kirixima jo'ch'inal jo'nimal ak xxokom, ut jun iiq tana chi seb'aad kixxok.
18: Kixk'am ut kox'okaq sa' li tenamit. Kixk'ut chiru laj alib'ahom re chixjunil li kixxok, kirisi li rela' li xtzekemq ut kixk'e re lix Nohemí:
19: <pb/>—B'ar xatwank chaq chi xokok ru seb'aad sa' li kutan a'in? K'ajo'eb' ru li seb'aad xaxok! Osob'tesinb'il taxaq li x'ilok xtoq'ob'aal aawu! chan laj alib'ahom re. <pb/>Ut lix Rut kixseeraq'i re lix Nohemí ani aj ik'in kiwank chi k'anjelak: <pb/>—Li winq li xink'anjelak wi' anaqwan, a'an aj Bohos xk'ab'a', chan.
20: <pb/>Toja' naq lix Nohemí kixye re li ralib': <pb/>—Usilaatinanb'il taxaq li Qaawa' li junelik naxk'ut li xchaab'ilal rik'ineb' li yo'yookeb' ut kamenaqeb'. Li winq a'an qakomon:<f>[4]</f> sa' xb'een a'an wank qatenq'ankil.
21: <pb/>Kixye lix Rut re laj alib'ahom re: <pb/>—K'e reetal, kixye ajwi' naq toj tinkanaaq sa' xyanqeb' laj k'anjel chalen toj taaraqe'q li xxokb'al ru li seb'aad.
22: <pb/>Toja' naq lix Nohemí kixye re li ralib': <pb/>—Us, maak'a' naxye, at inko'. Kanaaqat rik'ineb' laj k'anjel; chi jo'kan ink'a' tate'xch'i'ch'i'i sa' jalan chik na'ajej.
23: <pb/>Chi jo'kan lix Rut kikanaak rik'ineb' laj k'anjel re laj Bohos chi k'anjelak toj reetal kiraqe'k li xokok ru li seb'aad jo'wi' li triiw. Ut toj nahilank sa' rochoch laj alib'ahom re.
